interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Multicolors Crimped Bobby Pins, 96 Counts 2 Inches Non Slip Grip Hair Pins For Women, Safe Rubber Tips & Strong Grip Bob Pins, Bobby Pins Blonde, Black, Brown, Green
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: DARONGFENG
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray,Green,Brown', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 0.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair pins-D96-4', 'UPC': '741416436082'}
Review Text: There is a lot to like about these bobby pins. They are sturdy and come in multiple colors. They are pointed uniformly and seem to hold my hair well. Only issue I had was that they seem to grab my hair more than the drugstore brand ones that I am used to. Overall I think that more hair will get pulled out with these pins than my old ones.
Review Title: Mixed feelings
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce
Mountain Falls
["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Quickly, easily, and gently returns nails to their natural healthy appearance. Our formula is free of Parabens, and Phthalates."]
{'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 3 x 1.18 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'}
Great nail polish. It contains acetone.
Has acetone
Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Bioré
['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
{'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Biore delivers again. I am very happy with its cleaning power. Not sure how much this will sell for, but I’d be willing pay about $6 for this.
Works well
Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor.
MDDM
{'Brand': 'MDDM', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable,Cordless', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.82 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '738629925151', 'Manufacturer': 'MDDM'}
The shaver is sharpe and shaves closely, making for a nice shave. It does not have the most sturdy or well built feel to it as it is all plastic, but it will be a good shaver for traveling with.
Good economical shaver
Facial Kit For Women - Includes Facial Mask, Facial Makeup Wipes, Nose Strips, Facial Cleansers, Facial- Self Care Package For Women (Gold Facial Kit)
Golden Gift Box
{'Brand': 'Golden Gift Box', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 9 x 3 inches; 2.16 Pounds', 'UPC': '758176585691'}
This is a really fun facial kit, and Lord knows that the way things have gone with covid we could all use more fun in our lives! This would be a perfect kit to send to your friends and have a spa day over zoom. It has everything you need to feel pampered and it is super affordable!
A box full of fun!
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant - No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Solid Deodorant Featuring Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Lavender)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 5.12 x 1.14 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DSF-BS-LAV'}
This deodorant has a very strong lavender scent (which is a plus for me!) It went on smooth, though it was difficult to get the plastic cover off of the stick for the first time. It did a surprisingly good job of keeping odors to a minimum, even in the middle of running errands in the heat of summer. Overall I was very impressed with this product.
Surprisingly good!
Multicolors Crimped Bobby Pins, 96 Counts 2 Inches Non Slip Grip Hair Pins For Women, Safe Rubber Tips & Strong Grip Bob Pins, Bobby Pins Blonde, Black, Brown, Green
DARONGFENG
{'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray,Green,Brown', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 0.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair pins-D96-4', 'UPC': '741416436082'}
There is a lot to like about these bobby pins. They are sturdy and come in multiple colors. They are pointed uniformly and seem to hold my hair well. Only issue I had was that they seem to grab my hair more than the drugstore brand ones that I am used to. Overall I think that more hair will get pulled out with these pins than my old ones.
Mixed feelings
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferences:**
  - Strong preference for nail care products, particularly those designed for natural nails, with a focus on nourishing ingredients like Vitamin E and Panthenol.
  - Continued expansion into personal care items, now including gentle skin care products, grooming essentials, natural deodorants, and hair accessories, valuing effective formulas that cleanse without leaving residue.
  - Recent interest in facial care products and self-care items that emphasize enjoyment and fun, now incorporating practical grooming tools like hair pins that offer both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

- **Trends:**
  - Maintains a focus on product effectiveness and quality, reflecting a discerning approach to sensory experience despite mixed reviews on specific items.
  - A growing inclination towards health-conscious grooming tools, self-care kits, and accessories that combine convenience and a pleasurable user experience, emphasizing natural ingredients and a variety of options.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Evaluates products based on effectiveness, ingredient quality, sensory experience, user-friendliness, and packaging usability.
  - Engages in purchasing behaviors prioritizing holistic personal grooming, integrating facial care, skin, hair grooming, and practical accessories into routine.
  - Shows a willingness to invest in comprehensive self-care packages and functional grooming tools, appreciating value, fun, and satisfaction in personal grooming routines, often enjoying social aspects like spa days with friends.

This updated profile reflects an evolving commitment to effective and enjoyable self-care solutions across various personal grooming categories, now including a focus on practical hair accessories.
